Chapter.Title: Practice Exercise 4-3: Method with one argument
Chapter.Data: Python has a built-in class called math that has many methods, such as factorial, floor, and fsum, to perform mathematical operations. For example, the factorial of number 5 is given by the product of all numbers from 1 to 5. The factorial method takes one argument, which is the number whose factorial is to be determined. You can use this method as follows to find the factorial of 5: math.factorial(5) Write a program to calculate the factorial of 10 using this method and display it.
